text:
BREAKING: The new Chat GPT 5 is here.
 
Here's what you must know to catch up:
 
✦ 1. GPT-5 reasons by itself.
 
☑ The new ChatGPT knows when to think longer.
☑ The new reasoning mode is better & smarter.
☑ No need to select the right model anymore.
 
✦ 2. GPT-5 codes much better.
 
☑ It's a strong pair programmer.
☑ It helps with debugging complex issues.
☑ Perfect for traditional engineers.
 
✦ 3. GPT-5 is fast and reliable.
 
☑ It delivers answers quickly.
☑ Provides clear, structured responses.
☑ Makes using AI simple and easy.
 
✦ 4. GPT-5 is cheaper than the competition..
 
☑ GPT-5-mini costs just $0.25 per million tokens.
☑ Standard pricing matches Google's Pro tier.
☑ It’s twelve times cheaper than Claude 4 Opus.
 
I will share much more content on the new ChatGPT-5 in the next few days. Follow me at Ruben Hassid.
 
I am also writing a full guide (for free) on my newsletter. Join 118,000 readers at how-to-ai.guide.
